website_summaries.verdict: Especially recommended for people with thin hair and hair loss.
pros: The PURA D'OR shampoo strengthens hair follicles, starting at the scalp
It takes some time, but many notice stronger, thicker hair within 6 weeks
No doubt the shampoo's 17 key ingredients – including argan oil – add to its hydrating properties
cons: May not be the best choice if your hair is tangle prone

customer_reviews.title: This product saved my hair!
customer_reviews.text: About two years ago my hair started falling a lot and I became incredibly concerned. I was using expensive Sephora shampoos but it became worse. So I started researching and I learned about this product. Not only did my hair stop falling but the conditioner made it soft and shiny. I naturally have frizzy and dull hair so it really did wonders to my hair and saved me from going bald. I highly recommend this product. It is a bit pricey but your investment is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Maryam

customer_reviews.title: You NEED this!
customer_reviews.text: After giving birth to my second daughter i started losing hair and it was not growing back. Being a female this was horrible!> I started using this shampoo (i did think it as expensive ) but the reviews were great so i went for it. I am on my third bottle and i can say that not only did my hair stop falling but i now have new hairs growing! Best Shampoo ever!
customer_reviews.author: penman

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I have always had very thin hair. This product helps my hair feel thicker and fuller. I also don't notice as much hair left on my hands after using this shampoo. I'd recommend it to anyone with thin or thinning hair.
customer_reviews.author: Trey

customer_reviews.title: So much more volume!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I have only been using this product for a month but, I love how my hair feels. I can tell that my hair has much more volume and does not get as oily as before. I have not seen hair growth but, I need to give the product the full three months as it states. I will give another review once the three months is over with. I'm excited to have found a product that is organic and nurtures my hair!
customer_reviews.author: Cesar

customer_reviews.title: bait and switch. this used to have real ingredients ...
customer_reviews.text: bait and switch. this used to have real ingredients for actual hair loss. now it's a generic shampoo for hair loss due to breakage or thinning... avoid
customer_reviews.author: Hernan

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: This really seems to be working better than anything else. It makes the hair noticably healthier. I've gotten comments about it from friends. Good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Dan

customer_reviews.title: Does not prevent ‘hair loss’
customer_reviews.text: Notice how the label now says for hair thinning and breakage? It used to say for hair loss. So I did some digging... it seems there was a chemical in the shampoo that wasn’t ‘approved’, so they had to remove that and change their label... this is not a hair loss shampoo. In fact the foaming agent might actually cause hair loss. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Earthworm

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I just recently had a baby and I was suffering so very badly with postpartum hair shedding. My hair was coming out in large amounts. This product stopped the shedding dead in its tracks and the all natural ingredients don’t include any herbs that affect breast milk supply (like peppermint). I used it in combination with the mane choice hair vitamins, mane choice hair mask, and the apogee pro vitamin leave in.
customer_reviews.author: AnonymousMom

customer_reviews.title: Not original
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this shampoo for years and the one shipped to me this time is not golden color. It is silver with a hint of gold. Doesn’t seem original to me.
customer_reviews.author: Dhruv Bole

customer_reviews.title: LEGIT
customer_reviews.text: WORTH EVERY PENNY! Ive used stuff that was on Amazon for 60usd and it was worthless. This stuff makes my hair thicker, stronger, less prone to breaking. Caution if you have sensitive skin... Using 7 days a week Really dried my scalp out, so I switched to every other day.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Patton

customer_reviews.title: it works!
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is good, I did notice less fall outs, the pump does not work which really annoyed me. From reviews on YT I see that this is a reoccurring problem with the pump so don't expect is functioning. Other than that good product and decent price.
customer_reviews.author: ZALEZRICO

customer_reviews.title: This really works! No joke!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is incredible just how good this shampoo is. I had used it after an unfortunate incident with hair coloring that damaged and altered my hair leading to a significant hair loss. It worked wonders. I used it faithfully and experienced rapid hair growth and my thickness came back. Fast forward a couple years. And now...I am in perimenopause and my hair is just not the same. Started using Purador again...the results are so amazing I just ordered another bottle and I am never going back to drug store shampoos! Love, love, LOVE this product! Thank you for helping me to feel like a young woman again!
customer_reviews.author: MissValTat2

customer_reviews.title: It is not the same product as described. The ...
customer_reviews.text: It is not the same product as described. The product I got is "Due to Breakage Shampoo" and it does not have DHT blocker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was misled, as many other customers were. RECEIVED ...
customer_reviews.text: Was misled, as many other customers were. RECEIVED SOMETHING DIFFERENT THAN WHAT I ORDERED.SHAMELESS MARKETING PLOY TO GET PEOPLE TO BUY SOMETHING, AND RECEIVE SOMETHING ELSE. THERE IS NO MENTION OF DHT-BLOCKERS ON THE NEW BOTTLE I RECEIVED. I will stop being a customer immediately. It is ridiculous in this day and age to order something, and to receive something else - "an improved product" - in return. I am no longer a customer, and several of my friends aren't either.
customer_reviews.author: A.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my fiance and I because we've both been losing hair, especially him. After 3 weeks of using this I've decided to stop because I've noticed I've lost more hair and he has too. Whether this product can cause that to happen I don't know. I am sensative to certain things like tea trea oil, fragrances, and not sure what else. My fiance seems to have sensative skin and scalp as well. I would not recommend this product to anyone. And I'm real disappointed now that there's no satisfaction guarantee or your money back.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: I am very disappointed in this changed formula
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in this changed formula. My hair loss has increased after using it for over 4 months. The previous formula did not allow so much hair loss as this one. My scalp also feels dryer as if there isn't as much oil as the previous formula. Since I can't buy the previous formula anymore I'm trying a different brand. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Cherie A. Hime

customer_reviews.title: Not organic, with no DHT Blocker
customer_reviews.text: Last order was the real deal. Just ordered the exact same item and it came in a different looking bottle with no mention of 15 DHT blockers! What happened to the other product?
customer_reviews.author: samuel

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t care for this product. Made my hair greasy and I saw no improvement. I should have returned it but missed the window.
customer_reviews.author: jan

customer_reviews.title: Receiving a FREE BOTTLE for a review is a SNEAKY way of getting a bunch 5 star ratings
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure... but I believe asking for an "honest" review on yeailoveit.com, then asking to copy and paste on Amazon to receive a FREE BOTTLE is a SNEAKY way of getting a bunch 5 star ratings. I feel somehow deceived. I like the scent. I like that it doesn't have any sulfates or parabens. I do notice that it leaves my hair hard to brush, but then so do other shampoos. I use a leave in conditioner prior to brushing. But I'm not sure yet if it's helping me with my hair loss. I have been using it for almost month. I will update in a couple of months. Hopefully it does help.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Bravo

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy for my hair
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, the product makes my hair heavy and greasy. I so wanted it to work well as I’d read about it on one of my favorite bloggers Instagram, but I guess my hair is too thin. And I just realized that it is not eligible for return!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonObsessed

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended Shampoo, Great results !!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several other products, but nothing reduced my hair thinning. With all possitive reviews about this shampoo, I bought it and used it for 2 months. Pura d'or has really worked for my hair thinning problem; hair shedding has decreased from first wash; and now even seeing new hair growth. I am loving this Shampoo :) and recommend this for anyone who is worrying about hair thinning.
customer_reviews.author: Sunil Chakka

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for me!
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I started using this shampoo my hair has started falling out. This product does not work for me! I'm going back to my caffeine shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: What happened to the shampoo?? It used to ...
customer_reviews.text: What happened to the shampoo?? It used to have DHT blocker and now they are coming completely different ?
customer_reviews.author: Cholst

customer_reviews.title: What a shame to change such a great product that they used to make
customer_reviews.text: The formula has changed so it’s not the same product that was getting the 5 stars. What a shame to change such a great product that they used to make. Bring back the old formula!!
customer_reviews.author: SoccerBoy

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Did nothing to help the hair loss. I actually ended up lossing more hair
customer_reviews.author: Jackie cancino

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical about all of the claims with this product and gave myself a few months before I wrote a review. This product delivers. My hair loss has diminished tremendously. Probably about a fraction of hair loss compared to a few months ago and my hair is full and shiny. Very happy with the product. At first it seemed pricey but the product goes along way and is healthy for my body. I highly recommend giving this shampoo a try. Very worthwhile investment.
customer_reviews.author: jdg

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: Update the picture and description. Completely new formula. Also doesn't accept returns.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality shampoo. Lathers nicely, smells good, I think it cleanses the scalp well. Haven't really noticed any regrowth in my hair, but I certainly don't think it did any harm either. $60 spent, 2 bottles later and all the rave reviews I certainly had higher expectations. Just to discover they're giving away free bottles for good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: PrimeFan

customer_reviews.title: No more Hair Loss
customer_reviews.text: I've been using for 3 weeks and notice my hair is NOT falling out like before. There is very little hair in my brush when I clean it. When I wash my hair I gently massage my scalp with the shampoo and it works into a silky, smooth, thick lather the longer you leave it on. I try to leave it in for about 5 minutes then rinse. You definitely need a conditioner after washing because once you rinse out the shampoo your hair feels thick, matted and tangled. My hair is feeling thicker each day since it's not falling out. I strongly recommend that you buy the conditioner and scalp serum for max results.
customer_reviews.author: Charles W.

customer_reviews.title: Helping save remaining hair
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. Have been using this product for several years. Rate of hair thinning has slowed/stopped since using. Pleasant smell. Easy push to dispense.
customer_reviews.author: IDS

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase, item is NOT the same shampoo.
customer_reviews.text: In my photo upload, on the left is the shampoo I’ve been using, on the right(blue bottle), is the new bottle with inferior ingredients. This is NOT the same shampoo I’ve been purchasing religiously over the last 10 years. The users who claim this are absolutely correct. Pura d’or is charging the same for it. Pura d’or, what do you have to say about this? Until this issue is resolved, I will NO LONGER be purchasing this product. I will be purchasing Ultrax labs hair surge as their product is exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: No longer the product it used to be :- buy something else!!
customer_reviews.text: Older review - please read new on below : Perfect product if you are facing hair loss issues . I have been using this product for more than 6 months now and my hairs are now longer / stronger and healthy then past. Editing on April 2017:- It used to be the best shampoo but now this shampoo does not contains "ketoconazole" which is the key ingredient for hair loss . I realized that my hairs started becoming lighter and lossing strength and it was then when i re-read ingridents and other blogs. Please buy something else and dont watse your money here !! Its no longer the same product it used to be !!
customer_reviews.author: Tarun Grover

customer_reviews.title: No more hair in the shower drain!
customer_reviews.text: I was losing a lot of hair about a year ago (probably due to a thyroid condition) and decided to try this product. Very soon after I noticed that I had hardly any hair int the drain. However, 2 months ago I ran out and started using another shampoo just because I kept forgetting to order more and the hair loss started again. So I am back to using this shampoo and no more hair in the drain. I also like the way it lathers and leaves my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Pat H. Dames

customer_reviews.title: ... used this product for a few months and had amazing results. It seemed like after two weeks my ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for a few months and had amazing results. It seemed like after two weeks my hair was coming back in. Fast forward to my next shipment and a month later, I have noticed that my hair is falling out like it used to. I thought that maybe it was stress but then I come on here to replenish and see that its a different product! I didn't even notice when the packaging came in. I just thought, oh cool, a way better pump than the old one. This explains it! So unhappy!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Haycook

customer_reviews.title: Using it for long time but no positive results at all.
customer_reviews.text: Using it for long time but no positive results at all. Its just a regular shampoo like Nioxin
customer_reviews.author: P. Hegde

customer_reviews.title: Something wrong !
customer_reviews.text: We had been buying this shampoo last 3 years and last shampoo we got from amazon is not the same shampoo we had been using This made disturbance in my husbands scalp and made his hairs worse . The others helped him alot and he was pleased before
customer_reviews.author: J. W. Avery

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: I never write negative reviews but I feel like I should warn people. I have thin, fine hair. It has always been soft, shiny, and with the right products has body/volume. I'm menopausal so my hair is thinning a bit more, and I would like to prevent that if possible. Hence I purchased this and the corresponding shampoo. It TRASHED my hair. Within 3 washes (and I only wash my hair twice a week) it was the consistency of STRAW. So dry and disgusting. My hair became brittle, impossible to style, and frizzy. In 51 years, I've never had frizzy hair. I threw both the shampoo and conditioner out. $55 down the drain, literally. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: SaltAirHoney

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredible shampoo. I have used it for years and my hair is as thick and full as it it has been in decades. I strongly recommend this shampoo for anyone concerned about thinning hair.
customer_reviews.author: RAD

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: My significant other and I like this shampoo and conditioner. The smell is decent and not chemically. We like the natural ingredients. It lathers nicely. We both think it is working for us; we alternate with other “normal” shampoos to make it last longer rather than using it every day because it is a bit expensive. We like the pump top, though it makes it hard to get the last bit at the end of the bottle because it does not stand on its head very well. We have ordered a second set of shampoo + conditioner. This honest review is written in exchange for a free bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Miller

customer_reviews.title: I fell for the marketing. Don’t let it be you.
customer_reviews.text: The straw that broke the camel’s back was seeing an “advertisement”/paid article on shape magazine for this. This product used to be ok when it had a useful active ingredient. Ketoconazole. The only ingredient they had shown in credible studies to help with hair loss. Then they removed the ketoconazole but continued to market as if nothing had changed. I wouldn’t trust this company if I were you. After all the stink of this shampoo just ain’t worth it if it doesn’t have ingredients that work.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Formula change for the worse
customer_reviews.text: The original formula, the one with positive supporting articles about hair loss control, contained DTD blockers like Ketoconazole. This new formula that quietly hit the shelves drops all mention of DTD blockers and removes Ketoconazole: the VERY reason why I was steered towards this product in the first place! Looks like I'm back in the market for a shampoo which actually provides some sort of DTD blocker...
customer_reviews.author: White Clouds

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Beware this is not the old product which was good. This one sucks, don't buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Definitely, didnt do anything for my hair after a ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely, didnt do anything for my hair after a few months and saw more results from cheaper products. I'm actually under the assumption that it may be too strong for me or something as my hair seems to be falling out more than before.
customer_reviews.author: internet_user

customer_reviews.title: Accelerated breakage
customer_reviews.text: Awful product. It leaves my hair dry and brittle even after using the conditioner. I experienced more hair loss and breakage after using Pura D’Or anti hair loss shampoo and consitioner foe two weeks than before!

customer_reviews.title: Good Hair Care Product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this shampoo everyday for the past 8 days and my hair has never looked better. This shampoo spells really good and has left my hair soft while feeling thicker. My hair is typically oily so I do not require the conditioner. My wife has drier curly hair so she needs the conditioner to control the difficulty brushing after shampooing..
customer_reviews.author: James Mills

customer_reviews.title: Tangles hair
customer_reviews.text: This put major knots and tangles in my hair. I have average hair, not thick, not curly, just regular hair. I wish I could return it but, oh wait, YOU CANT RETURN IT. There goes 28 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: LatteAlameda

customer_reviews.title: not good
customer_reviews.text: It looks like it works the first couple of shampoos, then one starts to get hair loss. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: cathy

customer_reviews.title: False advertising!
customer_reviews.text: Once I got the bottle I saw it says in small print that it only prevents breakage. It does not prevent fall out or promote new growth. Kinda pissed me off when I found out I can't return it. Feel ripped off based on the verbage of the product description. Very misleading!
customer_reviews.author: thedeal

customer_reviews.title: This isn't the same product you used to buy. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.text: Same as the other mention. They have changed the product without updated pictures of description. The old product was much better.
customer_reviews.author: Jack James

customer_reviews.title: Not recoment
customer_reviews.text: Only good thing about this shampoo is the smell, they're asking for good reviews for another free bottle and probably that's the reason why most of the reviews are good :/
customer_reviews.author: mirza

customer_reviews.title: I have very fine hair that falls out/breaks pretty easily
customer_reviews.text: I have very fine hair that falls out/breaks pretty easily. This shampoo is my favorite product of the Pura D'or collection. It doesn't have any damaging chemicals and isn't oily or anything either. Ever since using Pura D'or I haven't used any other shampoo. When I put in my hair I can feel it working, and it makes my scalp instantly feel refreshed and healthy. I do not use the conditioner however, it doesn't work for me or make my hair that soft or easy to brush. The conditioner doesn't necessarily do anything special to my hair. If anything I feel like it weakens my hair after the shampoo had just made my hair nice and healthy and strong.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Paris

customer_reviews.title: My hair has never felt or looked so good since I started using this product
customer_reviews.text: The very first time I used it I was surprised at how shiny my hair felt and full, but ever since it has just dried it out and it has become dull. The main reason I wanted to try this was because my hair was breaking off and falling out. THis product has not helped that one bit! seem to be losing even more hair now then I was before .. very disappointed especially for this price!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good, not great
customer_reviews.text: To get the big question out of the way, yes it does appear to thicken your hair. Concerning hair loss though, I still have generally the same amount of hair loss when I I finish washing my hair as I did months ago. So I’m not sure that it regulates dht real well. All in all though, I wasn’t expecting magic so this product does still work well and give life to your hair. It especially makes it manageable if you like to style your hair with a product
customer_reviews.author: bronson

customer_reviews.title: Not good for my hair
customer_reviews.text: *Update* I tried 2 bottles of this stuff. My hair is now dry brittle and falling out badly so I had to stop using it. It was not good for me. I have horrible extremely thin hair...At first when i started using this shampoo my hair felt dry and like this was just not working at all. The smell also reminded me a dog flea shampoo. But i continued to use it. I think my hair maybe stronger now but it still feels dry. Id like to continue using it another month or so i guess to give the shampoo a chance.
customer_reviews.author: angry_animal

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo: Observations
customer_reviews.text: i believe you should add *castor oil* and keratin to improve this product. Castor oil is the best oil for hair growth and is not close. i had to buy one separately and use it together with this shampoo. Best natural shampoo in the market. I wish i had enough money to get the the keto shampoo but this one works almost the same.
customer_reviews.author: eduardo javier

customer_reviews.title: It worked for me!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for several years after alarming hair loss. To document any improvements I took pictures of how much hair I scraped from the sink after I washed my hair. After two months the loss slowed significantly. I was still skeptical so after using two bottles and seeing much less hair loss i switched to another shampoo. Sure enough by the end of that bottle I saw much more hair loss. I compared the pictures to be sure and repeated the test a third time. I also like how my hair feels and looks with this shampoo and the scent is pleasant, not like a drug store or perfumery.
customer_reviews.author: Kash

customer_reviews.title: An excellent discovery.
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell the most of this product the most. But this started working the day that I started shampooing with it. And I can already start to see my scalp filling out where there's no hair. I can't wait to see the results after three months!
customer_reviews.author: Olympia Tauri

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Scalp Itching. Had to toss it
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this shampoo caused my scalp and head to itch like crazy to the point that I couldn’t stand using it anymore and had to stop after 2 weeks. As soon as I stopped using it, itching went away. Obviously didn’t see any slowing of hair loss or thinning as it takes 6 months to work supposedly and I barely used it due to the severe itching. Buyers beware.
customer_reviews.author: Dan B.

customer_reviews.title: Gimmick, don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I have used this EXACTLY as instructed, and I have been very consistent with it for much longer than is necessary before you are supposed to see any results. I have seen virtually no difference. None. If anything, my hair is getting thinner and thinner. This is nothing but a gimmick, and after several similar products, I have concluded that they all are. Shampoo won't regrow lost hair. Just face it, and save your money. Seriously, they must have a thousand fake reviews or something. This does nothing but smell like lemon Pledge (yes, exactly like it). Carry on.
customer_reviews.author: Recoil816

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as old formula
customer_reviews.text: Thought about returning this product, and still might. This new formula makes my hair dryer than the previous, which I loved, and had great results from, very little hair loss, and actually some hair growth. $30 is quite expensive for a bottle of mostly aloe vera, and no more ketoconazole. There are still some good ingredients, such as saw palmetto, biotin, and argan oil, but it is definitely not near as good as the old formula, and no way is it worth $30.
customer_reviews.author: The Honeys

customer_reviews.title: It actually makes my hair thicker!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many products for my thinning hair, and this is truly the best item yet. My hair is thicker and appears to growing at a much faster pace than usual. I have been using this product for about a year now and it's amazing. I continue to get more every three months.
customer_reviews.author: Donna K.

customer_reviews.title: Extreme Dandruff maker and doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: Extreme Dandruff maker and doesn't work for hair growth. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: officeguy

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is completely useles
customer_reviews.text: First smells terrible, like strong lemon industrial floor cleaner. Right from the first time left my hair dry and feeling like straw. Still continued usage to give it a fair trial. After a month ZERO difference. Did nothing to increase hair growth, body or volume of hair, nothing. But the bottle comes in a fancy burlap pouch which was the only impressive point of this purchase. I will admit a Yahoo ad first brought my attention to the product and I fell for it. Definitely would not reccomend or buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyRed

customer_reviews.title: Never buying again!!
customer_reviews.text: Ugh... every time I use this.. it makes my hair feel dryer and clumpy. I got this coz my hair has been thinning and loosing volume.. and Im too young for that to happen just yet. Anyhoo.. I try to use this 1-3 times a week. I paid for it.. so Im determined to use it up until its gone. Wont be buying again though. But I do gotta say.. it looks like it has stopped the thinning of ma hair.. it dont think it made ma hair thicker or anything.. but it didn’t make it worse either. But hate how it makes ma hair feel. And I think its damaging my hair coz I have more coarse hair now.
customer_reviews.author: Race8876

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This is not for me. It made my hair to fall more. I have continuously searched for anti thinning shampoo but just no luck could not find any product that helps.
customer_reviews.author: Doggie AL

customer_reviews.title: Just an expensive shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I guess if you have full thick hair already and you want to maybe prevent it from thinning. Then this product may work for you. My hair is thinning a little in the back and after over a year of using this product I didnt see any changes. Does smell clean and It is alot better than using those shampoos with alot of chemicals and smell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the 1st one did really great to my hair
customer_reviews.text: I’ve made the subscriber of this shampoo after bottling up the 1st bottle, the 1st one did really great to my hair, I can see its effectiveness to solve the problem of itchy n oily hair and add volume. BUT, things got totally wrong after using the 2nd bottle, the cosmetic outlook of 2nd bottle was different from the 1st bottle, and I don’t have the feeling of fresh hair scalp every morning, instead it’s oily n itchy hair welcome me even the night before I have had used the shampoo. I’ve wrote to Amazon, to ask them to check the manufacturer, and claimed a refund.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Finally some hope !
customer_reviews.text: I have a severe case of hair thinning and early baldness. I have tried many shampoos including some quite expensive ones, but of no use. Stumbled upon Pura d'or one day and thought of giving it a try. I have been using this for a couple of weeks now and I am impressed. First off, the fragrance is really good and leaves a clean and refreshed feeling after shower. Hair fall has reduced drastically. Now I really hope it helps grow my hair back. Fingers crossed !!
customer_reviews.author: Rakesh Balavanthapu

customer_reviews.title: It's shampoo. It cleans hair. It doesn't stop hair loss.
customer_reviews.text: I used this. It's shampoo. It cleaned my hair. But it did nothing for hair loss, so I won't be buying again. Unfortunately Revita and lipogaine no longer have ketoconazole, the only thing really proven to work, so amazon pickings are getting very thin for effective shampoos.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about a month now. I haven't seen renewed hair growth or decreased hair fall for that matter. It does make my hair some what straighter. It tends to dry out my scalp to a certain extent which I remedy with some leave in conditioner. I was an aveda product user before I made the switch to pura d'or. I will continue using this product until i finish the bottle in the hopes that prologed use brings about results, but so far nothing magical.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: New formula not as good as original
customer_reviews.text: New formula not nearly as good as the old one. Used the original one for over a year, bought this last month and After two weeks, noticeably drier and more tangled hair. Trying to buy the original formula but can’t find it, switching to another product.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Wrong product
customer_reviews.text: It wasnt the anti hair loss shampoo but instead the anti breakage shampoo. It made my hair fall out significantly more compared to the blue label. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get a good conditioner with this. I would not recommend for thin hair
customer_reviews.text: Biotin shampoo for $10 on here is better for hair regrowth. This stuff was more expensive and dried my hair out as much as the $10 biotin one which is the only reason I tried this one this time instead. It smells great,makes my hair fluffy, but the texture of the formula doesn't easily spread across your head-you really have to wet lather wet lather and use a lot of product. Make sure you have a good conditioner if you want to try it, but it really dried my hair out and added to breakage which is the opposite of what I'm going for here.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine_uniKitty

customer_reviews.title: My hair is growing back and feels fuller/thicker
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product faithfully now for about a month and a half. Reason I ordered it was due to all the reviews and decided to give it a try. Before the shampoo my hair was thinning out and I've always had thick hair. My hair stylist noticed that my hair was thinning, brittle, and shedding alot. Well, since my last visit to the hair stylist 2 weeks ago, she noticed tons of hair growth and my hair felt thicker, fuller, and on the mend to what it used to be! I believe that the shampoo has a great part in why my hair is getting back to normal. I definitely will order this again. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TRASH-WILL MAKE YOU LOOSE MORE HAIR!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is trash. Nephew tried it for his thinning hair, not only did he loose more hair but also where it falls in the shower the shampoo he is also loosing hair in his chest. This stuff is worthless, if I could get a refund I would. It does not work as described!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Makes you more bald
customer_reviews.text: made my hair thin, greasy looking, and MORE bald than ever. switched to natural volumizing shampoo and now it doesn't look like I'm going bald.. man I was really freaking out from this junk.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed for sure......
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about this product but it has done nothing that a regular shampoo doesn't do sadly. I've used it over a month now.. plenty of time to see some kind of result. It's expensive so don't waste your hard earned money !
customer_reviews.author: Glenda

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the heavy price
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t stop hair fall ... i don’t no about regrowing the hair . It doesnt adress hair fall At all
customer_reviews.author: Azghar

customer_reviews.title: Complete Scam - does not work.
customer_reviews.text: No change whatsoever. This product is a joke. I've gone through an entire bottle at this point and there is no noticeable change in my thinning hair. If you are like me and wonder why this product has so many positive reviews, it's because this company offers a free bottle for writing a review when your shipment is received. Far too short of a time to actually test the product. Save your money and spend your money on something else.
customer_reviews.author: NerdHerd

customer_reviews.title: You wont grow a bushy mane of hair but you may stop it from falling out
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on other reviews and I have to say while it takes some time to work it does work. It's not going to grow you a new head of hair so don't get too excited. But after 3 months of daily use my hair was softer, fuller with noticeably less hair on the brush and I would say even a small amount of regrowth. The negatives are few. It often takes a healthy amount to work up a solid lather. Even so a bottle should later 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Beware!
customer_reviews.text: The only reason why this product has 11k+ reviews is because they seller offers a free bottle for buyers when they leave a review. Even though I'm using this product and it smells good, I can't in good faith recommend a $30 bottle of shampoo knowing that they have gamed the Amazon review system to rack up 11,000 positive ratings.
customer_reviews.author: rhapsaadic

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective:
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy the scent of this stuff but after using it for a few months, I'm seeing no improvement. In fact, because I'm using this shampoo instead of the previous one I was using, it looks like my hair is getting even thinner and weaker. This is unfortunate because I really like the smell of this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: SCAN GITTMAN

customer_reviews.title: Smells terrible and made my hair gross
customer_reviews.text: The smell of this shampoo is pretty tough to take. It wants to smell medicinal, but it's just...icky. I figured I would try it anyway, and it made my hair dry at the very ends, and so limp and lifeless I couldn't get it to hold a curl. I wanted it to work because it was less expensive than the shampoo I have been using, but it turns out I just wasted the money and had to buy the other stuff again, so it actually cost me more. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: nesietweet

customer_reviews.title: I Was hopeful But This Shampoo Was Ok
customer_reviews.text: I Was hopeful that this product would be significantly better than the rest due to the somewhat higher price. I have now used it several times and am not noticing that it is better than the other anti hairloss/thickening shampoos I have purchased. I have tried 7 other similar shampoos and this one is average compared to the others I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Jman

customer_reviews.title: I have used this product before but not purchased from ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product before but not purchased from this seller, My hair became very dry and brittle and head very itchy. I don't think this product is authentic.
customer_reviews.author: S-doll78

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: I don't think its worth the price. Never really got a soapy feel like most shampoo. Never really got a super clean feeling like most shampoo. I have thin hair and it didn't make much difference.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Nakayama

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for the last 1 1/2 years. I have noticed a big difference on the thickening and strength of my hair since I first started using the product. The Pura d'or shampoo was recommended by my sister who has been using the shampoo for several years to help with her thinning hair. The product smells great and doesn't leave any greasy residue. I recommend pairing it with the conditioner for best results. Overall great shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Jimi

customer_reviews.title: Works but....
customer_reviews.text: If you have gray/ white hair, be careful diluting this product. It left a gold or yellowish streak in my hair. I only used this once or twice a week, but apparently I should have diluted it a bit more in my hand before applying to my head. It DID seem to slow the amount of hair falling out and the smell more organic than flowery. I will continue to use the product until the bottle is empty but don’t think I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Mom22bratz

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price. Nothing special.
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion - this is just average shampoo, definitely overpriced. Maybe ingredients are good, but overall how hair feels and looks - the product not worth the price. I was using other shampoo with Biotin before (blue bottle), and it was one of the best I ever tried. When the time has come to buy a new one, I found bad reviews about it, stating that quality has degraded. Hence I decided to try this one. But it was miss...
customer_reviews.author: MF

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo, it works!
customer_reviews.text: So far I’m loving this product. I have very thin hair, that has split easily at the ends, all my life. After I started dying my hair the situation obviously didn’t got any better, and for the las 6 years, my hair doesn’t grow pass my breast. I have tried infinity of products, and I can honestly said that this shampoo has help a lot, and I see a lot of new hair growing. You have to be consistent, and used it often, but you will see results! I will update my review (if I remember) in couple of months, but I hope I can achieve much fuller look!
customer_reviews.author: Oren

customer_reviews.title: Spectacular Results!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this along with the moisturizing mask back in July, I’ve been using it since and I absolutely love the results! My hair was damaged and dry from excessive bleaching and started thinning because of the extensions I had. The shampoo scent is very pleasant and fresh and it definitely reduced my hair thinning to a very notable degree. With just 2 months of use, my hair looks very healthy as I went back to the natural color, it’s no longer dry and I can notice 80% less hair loss. I will definitely be using it every time I wash my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Chaza85

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far!
customer_reviews.text: So I'll come back and leave updates on this review, I'm sure. As of using it for two weeks, I really like this product. My hair feels healthier. I'm not sure if this is just my brain convincing me of this because I'm using the shampoo or if it's the actual shampoo, but I don't care either way - I like feeling more confident! This stuff smells GREAT, too. Like going to the spa. I really enjoy it. I have noticed less hair being pulled out when I run my hands through my hair, too.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this shampoo for 3 months and sadly, I have not noticed any benefit. My hair is still thinning, breaking & shedding at the previous rate. I will give it 3 stars though- because for a sulfate free shampoo, it does clean your hair and scalp adequately and without leaving behind an oily build up like most sulfate free shampoos. It doesn’t lather or spread easily, so if you have long hair, you will need 2 pumps or you’ll have to shampoo twice to get your whole scalp covered. The smell is pleasant, it’s a light herbal type scent. I doubt I’ll reorder because of the expense. I really wish it did work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Waste of my money
customer_reviews.text: I'm just a student so I invested in this product expecting to see some good results. Not only did it do nothing to my hair but instead by hairfall increased. I first associated it with other factors like maybe stress, lack of nutritious food etc. Funnily a lot of my hair fell during my hair wash. I decided to switch shampoos for a while because my heart broke looking at all the hair falling out in clumps. Then suddenly my hairfall during shower stopped by 90%. This shampoo is obviously not as good as the reviews make it look.
customer_reviews.author: Alia Sethi

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: This is just marketing, don’t buy it. My hair still shed like crazy and it’s super flaky. The smell is nice but not for everyone. In no way that this shampoo is worth nearly $30. You can try 5-6 other shampoos with that. I delayed my purchase 2-3 years because of the price. Turned out I should’ve just skipped it since it doesn’t even work as a normal shampoo, let alone the anti hair thinning. Also I see that they changed the ingredients and this version doesn’t have ketaconazole anymore which is essential to treat Seborrheic Dermatitis
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J. Cost

customer_reviews.title: Caused faster shedding
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: After about 1-2 months of use, and I had never lost so much hair so fast. Just received and started using it, but it seems like a quality product. The ingredient list is long, but that's often a good thing, and this one is filled with all the oils I look for in hair/skin care. The addition of vitamins I personally believe in is promising, too. I'm anxious to see if it does anything for my rapidly thinning hair. The label says to wait at least three months of continuous use for noticeable effects, which is very fair considering how slow hair growth cycles are. I actually love the odor and how my hair feels after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Public name

customer_reviews.title: Unethical seller. Asking for review in exchange of free product
customer_reviews.text: When I saw the number of reviews, I obviously wanted to order that. But after getting the product I came to know that the seller is asking for feedback in exchange of another free shampoo. So for 30 dollars you get 2 pieces.. And thats how this product has so many positive reviews.. Have been using it for 1 week so far. No difference yet. will update if i see nay visible effects. Also the shampoo is too thin...kinda watery. I have to use a lot to make some froth. Not happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Shobhit

customer_reviews.title: Pimple on scalp
customer_reviews.text: After using this shampoo, i'm having pimples on my scalp. I felt the shampoo was stopping the hair fall, but its also closing the pores on the scalp and resulting pimples on the scalp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Proof is in the picture
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I don't like is that is occasionally dried my scalp out. If I do a coconut oil treatment over night it fixes the problem, though. I use this with the conditioner and this photo is after 3 months of using it 2-3 times a week following the instructions. I also OCCASIONALLY use the growth serum but I forget a lot. I think the picture speaks for itself. I will definitely continue using this product but I do wish there was a way it could not dry my scalp out.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Metcalf

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price. Nothing special.
customer_reviews.text: I was suffering from heavy hair loss and decided to give this product a try since it had such positive reviews. But honestly I do not see any improvement in my condition. Have been using it for more than 2 months now. My hair fall and hair thinning is as bad as it was before. (BTW my hair fall is not due to any hormonal or thyroid condition as I got it tested). I wont order this again. Not worth the money at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lakshmi

product_meta.title: PURA D'OR Original Gold Label Anti-Thinning Biotin Shampoo (16oz) w/ Argan Oil, Nettle Extract, Saw Palmetto, Red Seaweed, 17+ DHT Herbal Actives, No Sulfates, Natural Preservatives, For Men & Women
feature_bullets: PURA D'OR IS THE LEADER IN HAIR THINNING THERAPY FOR THICKER & FULLER HAIR: PURA D’OR Original Gold Label Anti Hair-Thinning Shampoo w/ Biotin and DHT Herbal Ingredients is proven & tested to reduce hair thinning. It promotes hair strength & thickness with increased volume & reducing breakage. Results may vary.*

IMPROVE YOUR HAIR APPEARANCE: No more bad hair days due to thinning hair and dry scalp. Our anti-hair thinning shampoo w/ Biotin and Proprietary Herbal DHT Blend is here to the rescue. Packed with essential vitamins, our exclusive formula helps hydrate the scalp reducing dryness, brittle strands, and improves hair manageability.

PROTECT & STRENGTHEN YOUR HAIR: Our Key Active Ingredients including Biotin and DHT Herbal Blend protect your hair from further damage caused by external factors that lead to thinning hair. At the same time, these ingredients strengthen the hair shaft and cleanse the scalp, improving the overall health of your hair.

THE ORIGINAL, GOLD STANDARD, UNDISPUTED AND ONLY FORMULA WITH OVER 17+ DHT HERBAL BLEND: The secret to thicker hair is using a shampoo with gentle ingredients. Our formula is packed with a powerful blend of Biotin, Nettle Extract, Pumpkin Seed, & Black Cumin Seed Oil. PURA D’OR is always vegan, cruelty-free & manufactured in an environmentally responsible way.

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: Healthy hair for happy customers. We offer a 100% Satisfaction Guarantee. If you are unsatisfied with our hair thickening shampoo, let us know and we will give you a FULL refund.
